channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Symantec Security Analytics (SA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Symantec Security Analytics (SA)

item.title: CVE-2018-12241|2024-08-05T08:30:58.999Z -- symantec%20corporation -- symantec%20security%20analytics%20%28sa%29
item.description: The Symantec Security Analytics (SA) 7.x prior to 7.3.4 Web UI is susceptible to a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. A remote attacker with knowledge of the SA web UI hostname or IP address can craft a malicious URL for the SA web UI and target SA web UI users with phishing attacks or other social engineering techniques. A successful attack allows injecting malicious JavaScript code into the SA web UI client application.
